headline: Stable negative sentiment (score: -72.8)
key_insights: Optimism trending up 155% over 7 days (strong momentum)
sentiment_commentary:
• Frustrations dominate with 138 quotes including 105 at strong intensity - people are expressing anger very forcefully today.

• At 92.4, frustration levels remain in the upper portion of the typical range and climbed further from yesterday's already elevated 78.4.

• Optimism rebounded dramatically from yesterday's deep low to reach its 42-day peak, while fears stayed consistently quiet.
methodology: See METHODOLOGY.md. Scores use z-score normalization with empirically-derived intensity weights from analytics_config.yaml. Alerts at |z| >= threshold (configurable, default 2.0 for p < 0.05).
